General.Name: Jiangsu Lopal Tech Co Ltd
General.Description: Jiangsu Lopal Tech. Co., Ltd. provides automotive, industrial lubricants, and car care products in China. The company also offers engine coolant, urea solution for vehicle, smart equipment, plastic products, and lithium batteries. It operates under the Longpan, Klansu, and Dick brands. Jiangsu Lopal Tech. Co., Ltd. was founded in 2003 and is headquartered in Nanjing, China.

5.Name: Mr. Xue  Jie
5.Title: Chairman of Supervisory Board & Chief Marketing Officer
